ITEM.NAME: Potion
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Cheapo healing spray from Feels™ Inc. It works OK I guess.

ITEM.NAME: Super Potion
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Moderate price, moderate healing. Simple as that!

ITEM.NAME: Hyper Potion
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Oh dang, this spray heals real good! Not the best but hey.

ITEM.NAME: Max Potion
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Throw all those other sprays away, this one's the best!

ITEM.NAME: Revive
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: You got dead Dikémon? Fix 'em up quick with this weird cake.

ITEM.NAME: Repel
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Go away! Wild Dikémon won't go near you when you use this.

ITEM.NAME: Ether
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: You need Fight Juice! Drink it down! Use moves more!

ITEM.NAME: Max Ether
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: FIGHT JUCE MEGA SIZE! DRINK FIGHT JUICE! CHUG IT DOWN!

ITEM.NAME: Antidote
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: You got that barf problem? Eat this thing, it'll fix it.

ITEM.NAME: Paralyze Heal
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: You sticky? Clean that gunk right off with this goop.

ITEM.NAME: Burn Heal
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Rub this stuff all around your tum-tum to cool off.

ITEM.NAME: Awakening
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Hey, wake up! There's no time to sleep! Use this thing to wake up.

ITEM.NAME: Pokeball
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Catch wild Dikémon with this weird ball. It smells kinda gross.

ITEM.NAME: Ultraball
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Catch wild Dikémon with this weird ball. Works real good.
